title: Jim MacGregor
text:
James McGregor (1887 – 20 April 1950) was a South African <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 Summer Olympics</a>. McGregor was born in <a href="Ladybrand">Ladybrand</a>. In 1920, he was eliminated in the first round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201920%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20light%20heavyweight">light heavyweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="Edwin%20Schell">Edwin Schell</a> of the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>.
McGregor died, aged 62, in <a href="Benoni%2C%20Gauteng">Benoni, Gauteng</a>.
